fields_of_interest: Environment, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Trans-European Networks, Climate Action
eu_initiatives: Review of Nature Directives, review of Environmental Liability Directive, review of PCIs in the field of energy
subsection: Non-governmental organisations, platforms and networks and similar
membership:
EELC is a member of following associations: 
- the network of European Environmental Law Organisations, Justice & Environment  
- Network of Estonian Nonprofit Organizations 
- Estonian Social Enterprise Network 
-Estonian Council of Environmental NGOs (EKO)
goals__remit:
EELC offers legal expert knowledge for shaping and implementation of environmental law, in order to defend public interests. 
 
Our aim is that norms of environmental law and their implementation guarantee clean and healthy environment and biological diversity.
